pageContext.projectSummary: Belongingness is the human emotional need to be an accepted member of a group. Using visual language to interpret sharing your differences and still accepting the person creates peace. Design the series of motion posters to attract people to pay attention to the belonging.
pageContext.projectProcess: Compared with still images, the motion will leave a deeper impression and touch. Try to use two dimensional and three-dimensional style to visualize the different groups of elements. Find a suitable visual balance to combine two different groups.
